sentences.en: A tabulation of a function of two variables is cumbersome, but possible.
sentences.cn: 二元函数的列表法是不方便的, 然而是可能的.

sentences.en: Although the machine looks cumbersome, it is actually easy to use.
sentences.cn: 尽管这台机器看上去很笨重，操作起来却很容易。

sentences.en: Doctors are complaining that the system is cumbersome and bureaucratic.
sentences.cn: 医生抱怨说该体制复杂繁琐，很官僚。

sentences.en: Expression of hydrogenion concentrations in terms of molar concentrations is rather cumbersome.
sentences.cn: 用摩尔浓度表示氢离子浓度是相当麻烦的.

sentences.en: Information in the world is slower and more cumbersome, but very dependable.
sentences.cn: 世界中的信息使用起来更慢,也更麻烦, 但非常可靠.

sentences.en: It's rather cumbersome having to carry all these cases around.
sentences.cn: 把这些箱子都带着走动是件相当麻烦的事.

sentences.en: Of course, this very richness means that menus can get big and cumbersome.
sentences.cn: 当然, 这种极度的丰富性也意味着它们大而笨重.

sentences.en: Our Intelligence Service was untrained, cumbersome, and almost wholly ineffectual.
sentences.cn: 我们的情报部门人员缺乏训练，机构臃肿，简直毫无用处。

sentences.en: Sometimes cumbersome procedures at customs offices create delays.
sentences.cn: 有时,海关的复杂手续造成拖拉现象.

sentences.en: The Congreve rocket was cumbersome and poorly stabilized.
sentences.cn: 康格利夫火箭既笨重,稳定性又不好.

sentences.en: The cumbersome eighteen - wheeled vehicle was spread across the road, blocking all traffic movement.
sentences.cn: 这台笨重的十八轮车辆横躺在路上, 把交通全堵死了.

sentences.en: The furniture is too cumbersome to move.
sentences.cn: 家具太笨,搬起来很不方便.

sentences.en: The organization changed its cumbersome title to something easier to remember.
sentences.cn: 这家机构把它那复杂累赘的名称改得好记一些了。

sentences.en: They thought he might have thrown away the heavy, cumbersome key.
sentences.cn: 他们想他一定扔掉了那把沉重的拖累的钥匙.

sentences.en: They're making efforts to streamline their normally cumbersome bureaucracy.
sentences.cn: 他们正努力精简本来繁冗复杂的官僚体制。

sentences.en: Various method have been used for the disposal of this cumbersome material.
sentences.cn: 对这种讨厌的材料处置曾采用各种方法.

words.tran_cn: 累赘的，成负担的；讨厌的

trans.tran_cn: 笨重的，累赘的，难以携带的，缓慢复杂的，冗长的，麻烦的
trans.tran_en: a process or system that is cumbersome is slow and difficult
